about.title: About Car Alarm
about.description: LFG is the first app that lets you wake up to the roar of your own car. Record your car sounds and set them as your custom alarm. With advanced features like vibration, gradual volume increase, configurable snooze, and visual alerts, every wake-up is tailored to your preferences. Enjoy a unique, innovative, and fully customizable alarm experience.

battery.title: Battery Optimization
battery.message:
For reliable alarm functionality, please disable battery optimization for this app.

This ensures alarms work even when the device is in deep sleep mode.
battery.manualInstructions: Please go manually to Settings > Apps > Alarm App > Battery > Remove from battery optimization
battery.disabled: Battery optimization disabled - alarms will work reliably
battery.needsDisable: Please disable battery optimization for reliable alarms
battery.ensureReliability: Ensure alarms work even in deep sleep mode

batteryOptimization.title: Battery Optimization
batteryOptimization.message:
For reliable alarm functionality, please disable battery optimization for this app.

1. Go to Settings > Battery
2. Find "Battery Optimization" or "App Battery Usage"
3. Find this app and set to "Don't optimize"
4. This allows alarms to work reliably even in deep sleep mode.

Without this, Android may stop alarms after a few minutes.
batteryOptimization.manualInstructions: Please go manually to Settings > Apps > Alarm App > Battery > Remove from battery optimization
batteryOptimization.disabled: Battery optimization disabled - alarms will work reliably
batteryOptimization.needsDisable: Please disable battery optimization for reliable alarms
batteryOptimization.ensureReliability: Ensure alarms work even in deep sleep mode

backupRestore.title: Backup & Restore
backupRestore.backupCreatedMessage:
Backup saved successfully!

Note: Audio files are not included in backup. Only alarm schedules and settings are saved.
backupRestore.restoreConfirmMessage:
This will restore:

• {{alarmCount}} alarms
• Settings
• Recording names

This action cannot be undone.
backupRestore.restoreCompleteMessage:
Backup restored successfully!

• Settings: Restored
• Alarms: {{alarmCount}} restored
• Recording names: Restored

backupRestore.restoreError: Failed to restore backup. Please check the file format.
